scripts.logic:bundle: cd logic && VERSION=$(jq -r '.version' package.json) && jq --arg version "$VERSION" --arg output "dist/com.calimero.kv-store-$VERSION.mpk" '.version = $version | .output = $output' manifest.json > manifest.json.tmp && mv manifest.json.tmp manifest.json && npx @calimero-network/registry-cli@1.6.1 bundle create res/service.wasm --manifest manifest.json --abi res/abi.json
scripts.logic:publish:remote: cd logic && npx @calimero-network/registry-cli@1.6.1 bundle push $(jq -r .output manifest.json) --remote
scripts.app:dev: concurrently -n web,res -c green,magenta "pnpm --dir app dev" "pnpm run logic:watch"
scripts.dev:full: concurrently -n registry,web,res -c blue,green,magenta "pnpm run registry:start" "pnpm --dir app dev" "pnpm run logic:watch"
scripts.registry:status: curl -sf http://localhost:8082/healthz > /dev/null && echo '✅ Registry is running' || echo '❌ Registry is not running'
